text: Mailiifterl is an Austrian nickname for the first computer working solely On transistors on the European mainland. It was built in 1955 at the Vienna University of Technology by Heinz Zemanek. The builder plays 0n a quote on an operating computer: 'If it is not the calculation speed of American models that Whirlwind O1 Typhoon can achieve: it will be enough for a Wiener Mailiifterl' The full name is Binar dezimaler Volltransistor-Rechenautomat. 4 balillerl (s @n (wkan nicknaw for (e hrsL Compuler Wor Ob TrnSishors On (h Europear hailaud .
